name: Adventurer Knight
description:
This is an incomplete game for my first Ludum Dare. I was unable to put various things like HUD and tutorials. Still I hope you enjoy the game. =)

Commands:
Arrows: Move the player
Z: Jump
X: Attack
S: Uses the shield (As soon as you pick up the orb)

Ps: The aim was to make the sword become the shield, but it seems that I failed T-T
